messages.content: Create a VLAN 7 named database on port 0/1
enable, conf t, vlan 7, name database, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 7. </n> Which site do you want me to apply these changes to?
Create a VLAN 10 named voice_vlan on port 0/3
enable, conf t, vlan 10, name voice_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 10. </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?
Create a new VLAN 5 named control_vlan on port 0/1
enable, conf t, vlan 5, name control_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 5 </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/1'/switchport/access/vlan HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'vlan': {'vlan-id': [{'vlan-id': '5', 'name': 'control_vlan'}]}}
Establish a VLAN 5 named control_vlan on port 0/1
enable, conf t, vlan 5, name control_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/1, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 5 </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/1'/switchport/access/vlan HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'vlan': {'vlan-id': [{'vlan-id': '5', 'name': 'control_vlan'}]}}
Establish a VLAN 6 named sample_vlan on port 0/2
enable, conf t, vlan 6, name sample_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/2, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 6 </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/2'/switchport/access/vlan HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'vlan': {'vlan-id': [{'vlan-id': '6', 'name': 'sample_vlan'}]}}
Establish a VLAN 6 named sample_vlan on ethernet port 0/2
enable, conf t, vlan 6, name sample_vlan, conf t, interface Ethernet 0/3, switchport mode access, switchport access vlan 7 </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/Ethernet='0/2'/switchport/trunk/allowed/vlan HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'vlan': {'add': {'vlans': [{'id': '6', 'name': 'sample_vlan'}]}}}
Assign IP address of 192.168.1.1 and subnet mask of 255.0.0.0 to port 0/1
enable, conf t, ethernet 0/1, ip address 192.168.1.1 255.0.0.0, no shutdown </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/1'/ HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'Cisco-IOS-XE-native:GigabitEthernet': {'name': '1', 'ip': {'address': {'primary': {'address': '192.168.1.1', 'mask': '255.0.0.0'}}}, 'negotiation': {'auto': true}, 'mtu': 1500, 'shutdown': false}}
Assign IP address of 192.168.1.2 and subnet mask of 255.255.0.0 to port 0/1
enable, conf t, ethernet 0/1, ip address 192.168.1.2 255.255.0.0, no shutdown </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/1'/ HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'Cisco-IOS-XE-native:GigabitEthernet': {'name': '1', 'ip': {'address': {'primary': {'address': '192.168.1.2', 'mask': '255.255.0.0'}}}, 'negotiation': {'auto': true}, 'mtu': 1500, 'shutdown': false}}
Assign IP address of 192.168.1.5 and subnet mask of 255.255.255.255 to port 0/3
enable, conf t, ethernet 0/3, ip address 192.168.1.5 255.255.255.255, no shutdown </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/3'/ HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'Cisco-IOS-XE-native:GigabitEthernet': {'name': '3', 'ip': {'address': {'primary': {'address': '192.168.1.5', 'mask': '255.255.255.255'}}}, 'negotiation': {'auto': true}, 'mtu': 1500, 'shutdown': false}}
Create a new port 0/1 with ip address of 192.168.0.4 255.255.0.0
enable, conf t, ethernet 0/1, ip address 192.168.0.4 255.255.0.0, no shutdown </n> Which site do you want me to apply to?

POST /restconf/data/native/interface/GigabitEthernet='0/1'/ HTTP/1.1 Host: switch-ip-address Authorization: Basic base64_encoded_username_password Content-Type: application/yang-data+json Content-Length: xyz {'Cisco-IOS-XE-native:GigabitEthernet': {'name': '1', 'description': 'New interface', 'ip': {'address': {'primary': {'address': '192.168.0.4', 'mask': '255.255.0.0'}}}, 'negotiation': {'auto': true}, 'mtu': 1500, 'shutdown': false}}
